message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this incredible product! I think it's a game-changer and I'm confident you'll love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $14000. What do you think?
I appreciate your enthusiasm for the product, Alice! I'm interested in purchasing it, but I was thinking more along the lines of $12000. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?

Thanks for your offer, Bob! I understand that $12000 is a good price, but I was really hoping to get a bit more for this amazing product. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer it to you for $13000. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, Alice, but I'm still a bit too high on the price. I'd be willing to go up to $11000. Would you be willing to sell it to me at that price?

I understand that you're trying to get the best deal, Bob! I'm willing to make one more concession. I can offer it to you for $12500. It's a great compromise, and I think you'll really love the product. What do you think?

I appreciate your willingness to make concessions, Alice, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to meet you at $12000. This is my final offer, and I'm not willing to go any higher. Would you be willing to sell it to me at this price?
